000503.SZ.long_name: China Reform Health Management and Services Group Co., Ltd.
000503.SZ.summary: China Reform Health Management and Services Group Co., Ltd., together with its subsidiaries, engages in medicine e-transaction and e-commerce businesses in China. It is involved in medicine e-commerce business that covers 160 cities of 27 provinces. The company also operates a government procurement agency. In addition, it develops and provides intelligent management systems for medical insurance funds, medical insurance service systems, prescription audit systems, medical quality monitoring systems, social security fund supervision systems, intelligent monitoring systems of medical service, regulation management systems, and medicine information management systems. The company was formerly known as SeaRainbow Holding Corp. and changed its name to China Reform Health Management and Services Group Co., Ltd. in May 2018. China Reform Health Management and Services Group Co., Ltd. was founded in 1986 and is based in Haikou, China.
